title: Add direct case card navigation from Dashboard

requirements.summary: Make each task group in DashboardView clickable to navigate directly to the corresponding case card in Cases list view
acceptanceCriteria: Each case task group in the Dashboard is clickable
Clicking a case task group switches to the Cases list view
The target case card is scrolled into view and visually highlighted
Navigation works for all cases displayed in the Dashboard

file_operations.description: Add state management to track the selected case ID when navigating from Dashboard to Cases view. Pass the selectedCaseId as a prop to CasesListView and provide a callback to DashboardView for setting the selected case.

Add onClick handlers to each case task group that call the onNavigateToCase callback (passed as a prop) with the case ID. Wrap each case task group in a clickable div or button element. Verify existing styling and structure to ensure clickability works with the current layout.

Accept selectedCaseId as a prop. After rendering the filtered case list, add logic to scroll the target case card into view using scrollIntoView with smooth behavior. Apply a temporary highlight effect (e.g., border pulse or background flash) to the target case card using CSS transitions. Clear the selectedCaseId after highlighting to allow repeated navigation.

Accept an isHighlighted prop and apply conditional styling (e.g., animated border or background color change) when true. Use CSS transitions for smooth visual feedback. Add a ref forwarding mechanism or id attribute to enable parent components to scroll to this card.

requirements.summary: Add visual affordance to case task groups in Dashboard to indicate they are clickable
acceptanceCriteria: Hover state provides clear visual feedback
Cursor changes to pointer when hovering over case task groups
Styling is consistent with the existing light blue theme

file_operations.description: Add hover styles to case task group containers using Tailwind classes (e.g., hover:bg-blue-50, hover:shadow-md, transition-all, cursor-pointer). Ensure the hover effect is subtle and consistent with the existing light blue theme. Apply rounded corners and smooth transitions for a polished interactive feel.
